title: 2 Bedroom in Encino | Fitness Center, Heated Pool, Spa + W/D in Unit
posting_body: ['13-14 Month Lease', 'Price and availability may change.', 'Square Footage Is Approximate.', 'Olive Encino', '5501 Newcastle Avenue Encino, CA 91316', 'Call ☏ :', 'show contact info', 'Community Amenities', '- Elegant, Custom Designed Tile Walkways', 'Throughout', '- Professionally Landscaped Courtyards with Fountains & Tranquil Seating Areas', '- Elevators', '- Telephone Entry System', '- Moments from the 101 Freeway and Ventura Boulevard', '- Two Convenient Trash Chutes on Each Floor', '- Grand, Double Level Lobby with Furnished Mezzanine Lounge', '- Close to Sherman Oaks and the 405 Freeway', '- Gated Subterranean Garage with Assigned Parking', '- EV (Electric Vehicle)', 'Charging Stations**', '- Two Built-in Barbeques', '- High-tech Fitness Center with Flat Screen TVs', '- Heated Pool & Spa with Furnished Deck Area', '- 24/7 Emergency Maintenance Service', '- Valet Dry Cleaning Service', '** Subject to Availability, Additional Charges Apply', 'Apartment Amenities', '- Kitchen Pantry*', '- Pre-wired for Individual Home Security Alarm', '- Private Patio/Balcony with Storage', '- Mirrored Closet Doors', '- Walk-in Closet*', '- Individual Tankless Water Heaters', '- Breakfast Bar', '- Granite Countertops', '- Full-size Washer & Dryer', '- Closets Feature Custom Shelving', '- Custom Maple Cabinetry', '- Formal Dining Area', '- Central Heat & Air', '- Upgraded Fixtures & Hardware', '- Decorative Doors & Baseboards', '- Hardwood-style Flooring', '- Gourmet Kitchen with Black Whirlpool Appliances', '- Two Tone Designer Paint', '* With Select Apartment Homes', 'Pet-Friendly', 'Pets Welcome with an Additional Deposit.', 'Call for Details and Restrictions.', 'Contact Information', 'Viewing or Leasing Information', 'Call ☎:', 'show contact info', 'Location Benefits', '( near 405 and 101 freeways )', 'Tarzana, Woodland Hills, Reseda, Van Nuys, Lake Balboa, Winnetka, Warner Center, Sherman Oaks']
